DOC.brief_summary: As part 5-year national effort reduce teen pregnancy , University Rochester partner City Rochester Department Recreation Youth Services evaluate City 's replication Teen Outreach Program ( TOP™ ) 11-14 year old youth register 11 select Recreation Centers ( RCs ) . A youth development program demonstrate efficacy reduce teen pregnancy , school failure drop-out rate , TOP™ never study RCs . Advancing efficacy effectiveness , investigator also measure program fidelity obtain RCs .
DOC.brief_title: City Rochester Teen Outreach Program ( TOP™ ) Evaluation
